name: srgridm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c4), c1))

stmt.origin: simprd(wa(wcel(c0, csrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c4), c1), wceq(co(c4, c3, c1), c1))
stmt.pretty: simprd((c0 ∈ SRing ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c1[c3]c4)= c1, (c4[c3]c1)= c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c4), c1))

comment: The unit element of a semiring is a right multiplicative identity. (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
